summary: Inspired by Sacred 2 - Fallen Angel. Credits to Ascaron and Deepsilver for a fantastic game. ApachiiSkyHair and Temptress race required.
descriptionHtml:
[DESCRIPTION]

This is Sophia, an angel-like follower. Find her at Temple of Kynareth (Whiterun). I hope it still works. Inspired by Sacred 2 -Fallen Angel. Credits to Ascaron and Deepsilver. Maybe one can make an armor like her battledress (http://www.sacredwiki.org/index.php5/Sacred_2:Niokaste%27s_Blade_Dance).

[INSTALLATION]

Just un-zip the file and copy it to your Data folder.

[REQUIREMENTS]

IMPORTANT!!!

You need:

ApachiiSkyhair (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168) and optional colour file.

Temptress race (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717) + optional colour file

Armor (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6316)

Otherwise it will not work correctly.

[KNOWN ISSUES]

None. Make sure you have the mods installed which are listed above.
author: Faraodir
